DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the clinical and radiologic implications of the intraoperative microemboli during carotid revascularization.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Blood Flow Changes and Microemboli During Carotid Surgery
DOC.criteria: acoustic window for transcranial Doppler surgical criteria proposed by the NASCET and ACAS studies postoperative followup for at least six months patient consent carotid restenosis combined surgery emergency surgery
